attributes.action: give public sector employees. i.e nurses etc, a decent pay increase. and not the paltry 1.9% proposed by gordon brown today
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: nurses, ambulance crews etc should be paid for the valuable work they do every day. at present these employees are highly underated

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence.
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nurses-pay/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
